2024 年 6 月 27 日星期四 19:58:34 +0000每日 TED 演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks TED - TED.com TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到一些世界领先的思想家和实干家在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲，激发、激发和激发他们的想象力。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 TED 会议上值得传播的想法泰德TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到一些世界领先的思想家和实干家在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲，激发、激发和激发他们的想象力。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 zh知识共享：https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/泰德contact@ted.com https://pl.tedcdn.com/rss_feed_images/ted_talks_main_podcast/video.png每日 TED 演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks 144 144 科学技术娱乐设计 TED、TEDTalks、TED 演讲、灵感、创造力、技术演示、教育不非成人的
土壤中铅的隐患|伊薇特·卡布雷拉伊薇特·卡布雷拉There's an invisible health threat right under our feet, says investigative journalist Yvette Cabrera. She digs into the pervasive problem of lead contamination in soil — a particular risk for children in cities — and shares her action plan to map urban soils and help create healthier communities.土壤中铅的隐患|伊薇特·卡布雷拉There's an invisible health threat right under our feet, says investigative journalist Yvette Cabrera. 人工智能的过去 6 年——以及接下来会发生什么 |雷·库兹韦尔雷·库兹韦尔How will AI improve our lives in the years to come? From its inception six decades ago to its recent exponential growth, futurist Ray Kurzweil highlights AI's transformative impact on various fields and explains his prediction for the singularity: the point at which human intelligence merges with machine intelligence.人工智能的过去 6 年——以及接下来会发生什么 |雷·库兹韦尔How will AI improve our lives in the years to come? From its inception six decades ago to its recent exponential growth, futurist Ray Kurzweil highlights AI's transformative impact on various fields and explains his prediction for the singularity: the point at which human intelligence merges with machine intelligence. https://www.ted.com/talks/ray_kurzweil_the_last_6_decades_of_ai_and_what_comes_next?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:132599 132599 Wed, 26 Jun 2024 14:40:05 +0000高等教育不00:13:07泰德
如何使用微型机器人观察身体内部 |亚历克斯·吕布克、维韦克·昆巴里亚历克斯·吕布克、维韦克·昆巴里Would you swallow a micro-robot? In a gutsy demo, physician Vivek Kumbhari navigates Pillbot, a wireless, disposable robot swallowed onstage by engineer Alex Luebke, modeling how this technology can swiftly provide direct visualization of internal organs. Learn more about how micro-robots could move us past the age of invasive endoscopies and open up doors to more comfortable, affordable medical imaging. (This talk contains medical imagery.)如何使用微型机器人观察身体内部 |亚历克斯·吕布克、维韦克·昆巴里Would you swallow a micro-robot? In a gutsy demo, physician Vivek Kumbhari navigates Pillbot, a wireless, disposable robot swallowed onstage by engineer Alex Luebke, modeling how this technology can swiftly provide direct visualization of internal organs. Learn more about how micro-robots could move us past the age of invasive endoscopies and open up doors to more comfortable, affordable medical imaging. (This talk contains medical imagery.) https://www.ted.com/talks/alex_luebke_vivek_kumbhari_how_you_could_see_inside_your_body_with_a_micro_robot?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:132747 132747 Tue, 25 Jun 2024 14:51:26 +0000高等教育不00:08:58泰德
街头图书管理员致力于将书籍带给每个人 |故事书迷宫故事书迷宫As a self-proclaimed radical street librarian, Storybook Maze makes books appear where they're scarce. Through initiatives like free, public book vending machines and street corner story times, she eliminates book deserts — or areas with limited access to literature — by making books accessible for children in underserved communities. (And in case you're wondering, she shares how you can become a radical street librarian, too.)街头图书管理员致力于将书籍带给每个人 |故事书迷宫As a self-proclaimed radical street librarian, Storybook Maze makes books appear where they're scarce. Through initiatives like free, public book vending machines and street corner story times, she eliminates book deserts — or areas with limited access to literature — by making books accessible for children in underserved communities. (And in case you're wondering, she shares how you can become a radical street librarian, too.) https://www.ted.com/talks/storybook_maze_a_street_librarian_s_quest_to_bring_books_to_everyone?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:130850 130850 Mon, 24 Jun 2024 17:29:57 +0000高等教育不00:08:40泰德
一项科学突破可能会改变我们生产食物的方式 |大卫·弗里德伯格大卫·弗里德伯格Agriculture fundamentally changed the way humans live — but at a cost, using up huge tracts of land and wreaking havoc on the environment, even as millions still go hungry. Entrepreneur and investor David Friedberg paints a picture of the evolution of agriculture and introduces a scientific breakthrough — "boosted breeding" — that might just transform how the world produces food. (This conversation was recorded live with head of TED Chris Anderson.)一项科学突破可能会改变我们生产食物的方式 |大卫·弗里德伯格Agriculture fundamentally changed the way humans live — but at a cost, using up huge tracts of land and wreaking havoc on the environment, even as millions still go hungry. Entrepreneur and investor David Friedberg paints a picture of the evolution of agriculture and introduces a scientific breakthrough — "boosted breeding" — that might just transform how the world produces food. (This conversation was recorded live with head of TED Chris Anderson.) https://www.ted.com/talks/david_friedberg_a_scientific_breakthrough_that_could_transform_how_we_product_food?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:133189 133189 Mon, 24 Jun 2024 16:03:19 +0000高等教育不01:05:38泰德
人造肉是食品的未来吗？ |乌玛·瓦莱蒂乌玛·瓦莱蒂The way we raise animals is destructive to humans, animals and the environment, says cardiologist and entrepreneur Uma Valeti. He presents a solution that doesn't require you to give up your favorite protein-packed meals: cultivated meat, grown directly from animal cells. Reportedly some of the "most chicken-y chicken" you'll taste, Valeti envisions how such cultivated meat could save billions of animal lives, improve human health and help protect our planet.人造肉是食品的未来吗？ |乌玛·瓦莱蒂The way we raise animals is destructive to humans, animals and the environment, says cardiologist and entrepreneur Uma Valeti. He presents a solution that doesn't require you to give up your favorite protein-packed meals: cultivated meat, grown directly from animal cells. Reportedly some of the "most chicken-y chicken" you'll taste, Valeti envisions how such cultivated meat could save billions of animal lives, improve human health and help protect our planet. https://www.ted.com/talks/uma_valeti_is_cultivated_meat_the_future_of_food?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:132784 132784 Thu, 20 Jun 2024 14:56:40 +0000高等教育不00:13:31泰德
爱就要勇敢|凯利·科里根凯利·科里根Family life often requires extraordinary bravery, from navigating the daily challenges to surviving the unexpected crises. Author and podcaster Kelly Corrigan offers profound wisdom (and seven key words) to help you focus in on what matters most.爱就要勇敢|凯利·科里根Family life often requires extraordinary bravery, from navigating the daily challenges to surviving the unexpected crises. Author and podcaster Kelly Corrigan offers profound wisdom (and seven key words) to help you focus in on what matters most. https://www.ted.com/talks/kelly_corrigan_to_love_is_to_be_brave?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:132053 132053 Tue, 18 Jun 2024 16:06:48 +0000高等教育不00:11:38泰德
加拿大总理的领导力教训|贾斯汀·特鲁多贾斯汀·特鲁多Justin Trudeau has served as the prime minister of Canada since 2015. There's a lot to dig into from his years in office — and from his life before, as well. He sits down with organizational psychologist Adam Grant to discuss lessons learned about leadership and how he navigated early struggles with impostor syndrome. He also shares his approach to maintaining motivation in the face of disapproval and criticism, how he encourages people to speak truth to power, why he considered quitting and what keeps him awake at night. (This interview was recorded for the "ReThinking with Adam Grant" podcast.)加拿大总理的领导力教训|贾斯汀·特鲁多Justin Trudeau has served as the prime minister of Canada since 2015. There's a lot to dig into from his years in office — and from his life before, as well. He sits down with organizational psychologist Adam Grant to discuss lessons learned about leadership and how he navigated early struggles with impostor syndrome. He also shares his approach to maintaining motivation in the face of disapproval and criticism, how he encourages people to speak truth to power, why he considered quitting and what keeps him awake at night. (This interview was recorded for the "ReThinking with Adam Grant" podcast.) https://www.ted.com/talks/justin_trudeau_leadership_lessons_from_the_prime_minister_of_canada?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:132681 132681 Tue, 18 Jun 2024 14:58:35 +0000高等教育不00:36:41泰德
如何识别威权主义并选择民主|伊恩·巴辛伊恩·巴辛Democracy is about having choices — and authoritarianism is about not having them, says lawyer and writer Ian Bassin. Detailing the seven steps of the authoritarian playbook, he invites us all to put aside our differences and rethink our role in the fight for freedom, revealing the hope and power behind every choice we make.如何识别威权主义并选择民主|伊恩·巴辛Democracy is about having choices — and authoritarianism is about not having them, says lawyer and writer Ian Bassin. Detailing the seven steps of the authoritarian playbook, he invites us all to put aside our differences and rethink our role in the fight for freedom, revealing the hope and power behind every choice we make. https://www.ted.com/talks/ian_bassin_how_to_spot_authoritarianism_and_choose_democracy?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:126805 126805 Mon, 17 Jun 2024 14:40:48 +0000高等教育不00:16:18泰德
主厨对美食、文化和社区的看法 |马库斯·萨缪尔森马库斯·萨缪尔森The secret magic of good food is that it brings people and cultures closer together. Chef Marcus Samuelsson taps into that magic at his acclaimed restaurants and through his cross-cultural approach to cooking. In conversation with art curator Thelma Golden, he expands on the rich fusion of modern Black cuisine and how each bite is a celebration of the diverse, creative and joyful power of food. (Visit ted.com/membership to support TED today and join more exclusive events like this one.)主厨对美食、文化和社区的看法 |马库斯·萨缪尔森The secret magic of good food is that it brings people and cultures closer together. Chef Marcus Samuelsson taps into that magic at his acclaimed restaurants and through his cross-cultural approach to cooking. In conversation with art curator Thelma Golden, he expands on the rich fusion of modern Black cuisine and how each bite is a celebration of the diverse, creative and joyful power of food. “Ye Pariye Naz”/“Simorgh”/“Darya”|尼亚兹·纳瓦布尼亚兹·纳瓦布Singer-songwriter Niaz Nawab performs three songs, weaving stanzas from Persian poetry and philosophy into the latter two. “Ye Pariye Naz”/“Simorgh”/“Darya”|尼亚兹·纳瓦布Singer-songwriter Niaz Nawab performs three songs, weaving stanzas from Persian poetry and philosophy into the latter two. https://www.ted.com/talks/niaz_nawab_ye_pariye_naz_simorgh_darya?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:132680 132680 Fri, 14 Jun 2024 15:17:48 +0000高等教育不00:10:14泰德
